name: Humanity Optional
description:
a little clicker game made for Global Game Jam 2020 in which you help a friendly necromancer girl cultivate her garden!

How to play

Click graves to water them.  Graves decay over time and if left unattended turn to dust.  Watering them reverses the decay for a short period of time. Try to raise all the dead without letting them turn to dust.

Esc - Pause/Unpause

[ - slow down game time

] - speed up game time

Features
  • 3 cute outfits!
  • original soundtrack!
  • make friends!
  • puns!
